pyproct.driver.scheduling package¶

Submodules¶

pyproct.driver.scheduling.tools module¶

Created on 07/02/2013

@author: victor

pyproct.driver.scheduling.tools.build_scheduler(scheduling_options, observer)[source]¶
Factory function for scheduler building. Uses parameters to build up to 3 types of scheduler:
  • “Process/Parallel”: A scheduler based on ‘multiprocessing’. Can execute tasks in parallel.
  • “MPI/Parallel”: This one uses MPI to execute tasks in parallel. Only usable with an MPI driver.
  • “Serial”: A serial scheduler. Executes its tasks sequentially.

@param scheduling_options: Parameters chunk containing the details of the scheduler to be created (mainly scheduler_type and number_of_processes). @param observer: The associated observer (can be None)

@return: The scheduler instance.

pyproct.driver.scheduling.tools.send_message_to_observer(observer, tag, info)[source]¶
